Module com.example.batallanaval
Package com.example.batallanaval.controller

Interface IPreparationViewController

All Known Implementing Classes:
PreparationViewController, PreparationViewControllerAdapter
public interface IPreparationViewController
Interface for the Preparation View Controller in the Battleship game.

Handles user interactions during the preparation phase, such as boat placement, rotation, and transitioning to the game phase.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Esteban Arias, Junior Lasprilla Prada, Steven Fernando Arag√≥n

      Sets the main scene of the application.
      Parameters:

      Initializes the preparation view. Sets up event handlers and visual components.

    • handleReturn

      void handleReturn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event triggered when the user clicks the "Return" button. Returns the player to the previous scene.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click

    • handleReturnBoat

      void handleReturnBoat(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handles the event triggered when the user presses a key to rotate or unselect the boat.
      Parameters:
      event - the keyboard event

      void handlePlay(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event triggered when the user clicks the "Play" button. Proceeds to the game phase.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click
